text:
@marcorubio In other words, if heart attacks were going around & somebody HAVING heart attack was “hospitalized” (still don’t know why the “”s) for not being able to breathe, you’d consider that NOT a positive case for a heart attack??
Wow.
Did somebody staple your head?
